tutorial.speak:
Each lesson can be customized to fit your church's needs. Click the small but powerful Customize link next to any scheduled lesson.
The Customize Lesson page shows all the sections in your lesson. You can remove sections you don't want to use.
Click on a section to select it, then click the trash icon to remove it.
You'll be asked where to apply this change. Choose This Classroom to only affect this classroom, or All the Classrooms if multiple classrooms are using the same lesson but only some need editing.
Removed sections appear in red with a strikethrough. You can also reorder sections using the up and down arrows.
Select any item and use the arrows to move it up or down in the lesson order.
Remember, you can apply changes to just this classroom or all classrooms depending on your ministry's needs.
Your customized lesson is now ready. The changes will be reflected when you present the lesson.
